typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SourceTableName as string (""),
	TargetTableName as string (""),
	PrimaryKey as string (""),
	TimestampColumn as string
}
source(output(
		CompanyName as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		ModifiedDate as string,
		NameStyle as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		Phone as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		Suffix as string,
		Title as string,
		rowguid as string,
		SourceFileName as string,
		DateInserted as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: ("delta/bronze/Customer/")) ~> BronzeDelta
BronzeDelta derive(PkColumn = byName($PrimaryKey),
		TSColumn = byName($TimestampColumn)) ~> AddMetadataColums
AddMetadataColums window(over(PkColumn),
	desc(TSColumn, true),
	RowVersion = denseRank()) ~> RankRowVersions
RankRowVersions filter(RowVersion==1) ~> Deduplicate
Deduplicate select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name!="PkColumn"&&name!="TSColumn"&&name!="RowVersion"))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveMetadataColumns
RemoveMetadataColumns parse(ParsedEmailAddress = EmailAddress ? (UserName as string,
		Domain as string),
	format: 'delimited',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	columnDelimiter: '@',
	nullValue: '') ~> ParseEmailAddress
ParseEmailAddress derive(UserName = ParsedEmailAddress.UserName,
		Domain = ParsedEmailAddress.Domain) ~> ExtractEmailAddressParts
ExtractEmailAddressParts select(mapColumn(
		CompanyName,
		CustomerID,
		EmailAddress,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		MiddleName,
		ModifiedDate,
		NameStyle,
		PasswordHash,
		PasswordSalt,
		Phone,
		SalesPerson = SalesPersonNew,
		Suffix,
		Title,
		rowguid,
		SourceFileName,
		DateInserted,
		ParsedEmailAddress,
		UserName,
		Domain
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveParsedEmail
RemoveParsedEmail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: (concat("delta/silver/",$TargetTableName,"/")),
	truncate:true,
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SilverDelta
